description: Lightweight, 4-Way stretch amphibious short for year round multi-purpose function. Lower zip pocket for locking in your goods. 19” outseam with internal drawcord waist to enhance movement while securing the shorts. Quick drying, polyester cotton blend stretch fabric enhancing performance in and out of the water. Mesh lined pocket bags for breathability on land and flow through in the water.
name: Roark Explorer 2.0 Shorts - Mens
